data.enText: a piece of artificial hair that is worn on the head, for example to hide the fact that a person is bald , to cover sb's own hair, or by a judge and some other lawyers in some courts of law

data.chText: 变得激动（或焦虑、生气）；发狂
data.enText: to become very excited, very anxious or angry about sth; to go crazy

data.chText: 变得激动（或焦虑、生气）；发狂
data.enText: to become very excited, very anxious or angry about sth; to go crazy

tr: hairpiece covering the head and made of real or synthetic hair

value.def: A wig is a covering of false hair which you wear on your head, for example because you have little hair of your own or because you want to cover up your own hair.

trans: (尤指小丑戴的发丝竖立或四散的)滑稽假发
